frame.frame_description_en: This frame describes a situation where an Ingestor eats or drinks some Ingestibles. The event can be understood as part of a Meal, and it can be located in Time and Place. The description may also include the Manner of eating or drinking, the Instrument used, and the Quantity consumed.
frame.frame_description_html: This frame describes a situation where an Ingestor eats or drinks some Ingestibles. The event can be understood as part of a Meal, and it can be located in Time and Place. The description may also include the Manner of eating or drinking, the Instrument used, and the Quantity consumed.

elements.name: Ingestor
elements.description_en: The person or animal that eats or drinks.
elements.description_html: The person or animal that eats or drinks.

elements.name: Ingestibles
elements.description_en: The food or drink that is eaten or drunk.
elements.description_html: The food or drink that is eaten or drunk.

elements.name: Meal
elements.description_en: The eating/drinking occasion the event belongs to (for example breakfast, lunch, or dinner).
elements.description_html: The eating/drinking occasion the event belongs to (for example breakfast, lunch, or dinner).

elements.name: Time
elements.description_en: When the eating or drinking happens.
elements.description_html: When the eating or drinking happens.

elements.name: Place
elements.description_en: Where the eating or drinking happens.
elements.description_html: Where the eating or drinking happens.

elements.name: Manner
elements.description_en: How the Ingestor eats or drinks (for example quickly, slowly, or politely).
elements.description_html: How the Ingestor eats or drinks (for example quickly, slowly, or politely).

elements.name: Instrument
elements.description_en: The tool used to eat or drink (for example a fork, spoon, chopsticks, or a glass).
elements.description_html: The tool used to eat or drink (for example a fork, spoon, chopsticks, or a glass).

elements.name: Quantity
elements.description_en: How much is eaten or drunk.
elements.description_html: How much is eaten or drunk.

frame.note_on_roles_en: A frame can have one role or many roles. A sentence can mention only some roles.
